title: R-symmetry of heterotic N=2 supergravities
abstract: The topological twist of N=2, D=4 matter-coupled supergravities requires a suitable R-symmetry. This symmetry is realised in the effective supergravities arising at tree level from certain heterotic compactifications. The set of instanton equations (topological gauge-fixings) is thus obtained. The conditions that R-symmetry should satisfy also when these theories are replaced by their ``exact'' quantum-corrected counterparts are investigated.
